description:
Inov-8 continues to push the boundaries with the world’s first Graphene-enhanced foam that delivers even greater rebound and energy return. This lightweight mid-height hiking boot provides ankle protection and stability on uneven or rocky trails. A cushy footbed makes 15km days feel like 5km days, and a grippy sole keeps you steady on uneven or slippery terrain, so you can focus on the view.

  • Lightweight synthetic upper is durable and breaths well
  • POWER footbed adds extra cushion and rebound to your shoes when getting km’s in on the trail
  • ADAPTER-FLEX™ groove increases agility and reactivity
  • G-FLY Graphene-enhanced foam offers great shock absorption and energy return
  • G-Grip graphene enhanced rubber for traction and increased outsole durability across all kinds of terrain
  • 4mm lugs bite into muddy trails
name: Inov-8 RocFly G 390 Light Trail Shoes - Men's
